Title: War on Cooties: Bringing Nerd Men and Women to the Same Gameboard
Presenters: Victoria Stapels, April Nance, Sunny Smith, Erika Carlson, Eva Galperin
Book Description: 'From Samus Aran to Princess Peach- equal gender representation in nerd culture has been slim at best. With the way we are already judging each other for who is the most ‘L337’ nerd- it’s no surprise that women are getting even more judgement from the nerd community at large. Where are all the female heroes? The tournament-winning chicks? And why are you judging me for kicking YOUR butt in Super Smash Bros.? No matter your gender- please join in on this hot topic! This panel aims to discuss the social issues- inequality and perks that come with being a geeky lady!'

Title: Creating Safe Spaces
Presenters: Nuri Gocay, April Nance, Scott Kennedy, Karen Morand, Dawn Kuczwara
Book Description: 'How can we create safe spaces for people of all varieties at the convention- and in our lives outside of fandom? Join a discussion with our staff (including the con chair) and those who have ideas on how we can do better on inclusivity and promoting consent.'

Title: LGBTQA* - An Alphabet Soup Q&A
Presenters: April Nance, Alexa Albright-Kelley, Julie Hargraves, James Dobbs, Hope Dundas, Maggi Rohde Idzikowski, Carol Thomas, Michael Ryan McPeek, Jennifer Copeland
Book Description: 'A discussion on LGBT/Queer Culture within fandom. This includes challenges faced- successes of fandom culture- and opportunities for improving inclusivity/diversity within fandom. This will be a hands-on discussion where a diverse panel will represent a variety of the gender and sexual spectrum and audience participation will be encouraged. Our panelists will be happy to address general questions about the gender and sexual spectrum after the panel- as well as providing resources for further learning.'
